name: Zogda
description:
Hello! This game was created for the Vimjam, under the focus of collectables and the theme "There and back". This is is my first time at a game jam, and the second project that I create with Unity.

Zogda it's a simple game where you use the mouse to move towards the desired position just by clicking with the limitation that our character always returns to the same point, a mechanic inspired by the theme of this game jam. 

As for the limitaions for the jam, I could only deliver for the one about easter eggs; as you can see, you can unlock certian secret planets if you manage to get a high score, more details in the main menu.

The story part of this game it's a little simple, I was looking for a lovecraftian vibe, but this is what I came up with.  

Thanks for playing! I would really appreciate a rate.

Note: I ran into some troubles when I created the build for webGL in Unity, so for time reasons I found a temporal solution by adding a development build, the game runs, but it takes like 30 seconds to load, my apologies. I recommend to check the Zogda.zip file for Windows for a better experience.
